remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `Count` 已经等于容量，则会在插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，以将列表的容量加倍。If `Count` already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果 `index` 等于 `Count`，则 `value` 添加到 `XmlSchemaObjectCollection`的末尾。If `index` is equal to `Count`, `value` is added to the end of `XmlSchemaObjectCollection`. 在插入点之后的元素向下移动以容纳新元素。The elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与 成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是说，此方法是一个 O （`n`）操作，其中 `n` 是 的。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用 确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 移除的元素下面的元素将上移以占用空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
